description: Illegal Banner throughout mini-mall shopping center. Illegal Banners for cigarettes on every light pole.  Banners for the lottery under Mansard roof.  Beer banners on windows.  Banners on bushes in planter area.  Signs for pizza on stakes in planter areas.  Det fascia & broken window.  Trash & debris
